text: Ralph Everard Gonsalves (born 8 August 1946) is a Vincentian politician. He is currently the 4th Prime Minister of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines from 28 March 2001, and leader of the Unity Labour Party (ULP) from 6 December 1998. Under his leadership, the country forged greater ties with other countries such as Iran, Venezuela, and Cuba. Profile , caribbeanelections.com; accessed 1 September 2014. == References == Category:1946 births Category:Prime Ministers of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:North American lawyers Category:Current national leaders Category:Living people Category:University of the West Indies alumni
title: Ralph Gonsalves
